articles.content: Following the news that Stassi Schroeder, Kristen Doute, Max Boyens, and Brett Caprioniwould not be returning to Vanderpump Rules, Lisa Vanderpump shared a statement on her Instagram on Wednesday, Ju… [+4856 chars]
